key.name: AuxiliaryFile
key.description: Name of auxiliary data file

key.name: BurninTime
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.burn_tim in seconds. (i.e. 3600)

key.name: Cable
key.description: Interface cable type

key.name: CableType
key.description: Interface cable type

key.name: Card
key.description: Probe card ID

key.name: CardType
key.description: Probe card type

key.name: CommandModeCode
key.description: Command mode code

key.name: Contactor
key.description: Handler contactor ID

key.name: ContactorType
key.description: Handler contactor type

key.name: DataOrigin
key.description: Read Only. Contains the source file path for the file.

key.name: DataPumpName
key.description: Read Only. Contains the name of the datapump that inserted the data.

key.name: DatabaseName
key.description: Read Only. Contains the name of the Database that inserted the data.

key.name: SplitlotId
key.description: Read Only. Contains the name of the SplitlotId.

key.name: TestingStage
key.description: Read Only. Contains the TestingStage.

key.name: TimeUncompress
key.description: Read Only. Contains the TimeUncompress.

key.name: TimeConvertion
key.description: Read Only. Contains the TimeConvertion.

key.name: TimeInsertion
key.description: Read Only. Contains the TimeInsertion.

key.name: InsertionStatus
key.description: Read Only. Contains the InsertionStatus.

key.name: ConsolidationProcess
key.description: Read Only. Contains the Consolidation policy.

key.name: ConsolidationProcessStatus
key.description: Read Only. Contains the Consolidation Status.

key.name: DataType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.data_type as a string. (i.e. production, characterization, QA, etc...)

key.name: DateCode
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.date_cod as a string.

key.name: DesignRevision
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.dsgn_rev as a string.

key.name: DibName
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.dib_id as a string.

key.name: DibType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.dib_typ as a string.

key.name: Engineering
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.eng_id as a string. Engineering lot ID

key.name: EtestSiteConfig
key.description: Populates xx_wafer_info.site_config as a string. Valid values are file names for the svg configuration of etest measurement locations.

key.name: ExecType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.exec_typ as a string. Tester executive software type

key.name: ExecVersion
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.exec_ver as a string. Tester exec software version number

key.name: ExtraName
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.extra_id as a string. This is an extra field for customization. Use metadata to allow querying.

key.name: ExtraType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.extra_typ as a string. This is an extra field for customization. Use metadata to allow querying.

key.name: Facility
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.facil_id as a string.

key.name: Family
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.famly_id as a string.

key.name: FileName
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.file_name as a string.

key.name: FinishTime
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.finish_t as a unix time.

key.name: Floor
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.floor_id as a string.

key.name: Flow
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.flow_id as a string. Test flow ID

key.name: FrequencyStep
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.oper_frq as a string. Operation frequency or step

key.name: FtpServer
key.description: For use when YM is to FTP a file after insertion: Holds the FTP server name (i.e. ftp.galaxysemi.com). If this path is not a FTP path but a server path (i.e. \\server\folder), then no FTP takes place. For this case, a file copy is executed instead, and all other FTP details are ignored.

key.name: FtpPort
key.description: For use when YM is to FTP a file after insertion: Holds the FTP port.

key.name: FtpUser
key.description: For use when YM is to FTP a file after insertion: Holds the FTP user login name.

key.name: FtpPassword
key.description: For use when YM is to FTP a file after insertion: Holds the FTP user login password.

key.name: FtpPath
key.description: For use when YM is to FTP a file after insertion: Holds the FTP sub-path from the login folder (i.e. data_files). If this path remains empty, the files are stored at the FTP root location.

key.name: GrossDie
key.description: Populaltes xx_wafer_info.gross_die.

key.name: HeadNumber
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.head_num as a string. Test head number

key.name: LaserType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.laser_typ as a string. Laser type

key.name: Laser
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.laser_id as a string. Laser ID

key.name: LoadBoard
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.loadboard_id as a string.

key.name: LoadBoardType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.loadboard_typ as a string.

key.name: Lot
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.lot_id as a string.

key.name: MovePath
key.description: Post-insert move folder. Available in the datapump task. Populates xx_splitlot.file_path.

key.name: MoveFile
key.description: Read Only.

key.name: Operator
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.oper_nam as a string.

key.name: PackageType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.pkg_typ as a string.

key.name: ProberName
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.handler_id as a string.

key.name: ProberType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.handler_typ as a string.

key.name: Process
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.proc_id as a string.

key.name: ProdData
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.prod_data. Must be Y or N. If Y, data inserted are subject to binning consolidation. YM updates the binning statistics so all tests and retests are properly combined

key.name: Product
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.part_typ as a string.

key.name: ProgramName
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.job_nam as a string.

key.name: ProgramRevision
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.job_rev as a string.

key.name: ProtectionCode
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.prot_cod as a char. Data protection code

key.name: RetestBinList
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.retest_hbins as a string. When (test and retest), it is important to populate this with the bins to be retested so that test and retest data at final test is combined properly. (i.e. all, all_fail, 1, or ѳ,6,8,9ҩ).

key.name: RetestCode
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.rtst_cod as a char. Lot retest code

key.name: RetestIndex
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.retest_index as an integer. When (test and retest), it is important to fill in 0 for initial test and increment this field for every retest.

key.name: RetestPhase
key.description: (Replaced by TestInsertion) Populates xx_splitlot.test_insertion as a string.

key.name: TestInsertion
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.test_insertion as a string. To generate Intermediate Consolidation per test insertion, it is necessary to fill this key with the Insertion Name. This will activate the consolidation process for each Intermediate Phase in addition to the test_flow consolidation.

key.name: TestFlow
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.test_flow as a string. Initialized with MODE_COD value. To disable the consolidation process, overwrite this key with an empty string

key.name: ConsolidationAlgo
key.description: Populates (xx_wafer_info|ft_sublot_info).consolidation_algo as a string. When multi test insertion, it is important to populate it with the Algo to aggregate the Consolidation result of each Intermediate Phase. (i.e. last_bin, first_fail, highest_bin, first_bin...)

key.name: RomCode
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.rom_cod as a string. ROM code ID

key.name: SerialNumber
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.serl_num as a string. Tester serial number

key.name: Setup
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.setup_id as a string. Test setup ID

key.name: SetupTime
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.setup_t. Holds tester setup time for this data file in UnixTime. This is the number of seconds elapsed since Jan 1st, 1970. Favor using the SetupTime.Date() syntax only as it allows returning a date/time string in the format of your choice.

key.name: SiteNumbers
key.description: SiteNumbers

key.name: SourceArchive
key.description: Read Only. Holds the test data original file name inserted prior to any decompression task. (i.e. for inserted file1.std.gz, SourceArchive = Ҧile1.std.gzҬ while FileName = Ҧile1.stdҩ

key.name: SpecName
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.spec_nam as a string.

key.name: SpecVersion
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.spec_ver as a string. Test specification version number

key.name: StartTime
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.start_t only if the inserted file does not have a valid start time. Holds test starting date and time for the data file. Favor using StartTime.Date() syntax only as it allows returning a date/time string in the format of your choice.

key.name: Station
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.stat_num as an integer number. Represents the testing Station.

key.name: StdfFileName
key.description: Read Only. Holds the STDF file name inserted: applies to data files not in STDF format that are first converted to STDF by the Yield-MAN parser. (i.e. For file Ҧile1.watҬ YM will first parse to STDF, then insert the file.)

key.name: StdfFileSize
key.description: Read Only. Holds the STDF file size

key.name: FileSize
key.description: Read Only. Holds the STDF file size

key.name: FullDestinationName
key.description: Read Only. Holds the STDF file Full Destination Name

key.name: ConfigFileName
key.description: Read Only. Indicates the gexdbkeys.config file used

key.name: SubconLot
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.subcon_lot_id as a string.

key.name: SubLot
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.sublot_id as a string.

key.name: SupervisorName
key.description: Supervisor name or ID

key.name: Temperature
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.tst_temp as a string.

key.name: TesterName
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.tester_name as a string.

key.name: TesterType
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.tester_type as a string.

key.name: TestingCode
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.test_cod as a string.

key.name: UploadFile
key.description: Read Only.

key.name: User1
key.description: User key for generic usage. Use as a variable.

key.name: User1Label
key.description: User key for generic llabel usage. Use as a label variable.

key.name: User2
key.description: User key for generic usage. Use as a variable.

key.name: User2Label
key.description: User key for generic llabel usage. Use as a label variable.

key.name: User3
key.description: User key for generic usage. Use as a variable.

key.name: User3Label
key.description: User key for generic llabel usage. Use as a label variable.

key.name: User4
key.description: User key for generic usage. Use as a variable.

key.name: User4Label
key.description: User key for generic llabel usage. Use as a label variable.

key.name: User5
key.description: User key for generic usage. Use as a variable.

key.name: User5Label
key.description: User key for generic llabel usage. Use as a label variable.

key.name: UserText
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.user_txt as a string. User text has a 256 character limit.

key.name: Validation
key.description: Used to reject file on some critere

key.name: Wafer
key.description: Populates xx_splitlot.wafer_id as a string. Cannot be used in files that have more than one wafer such as etest files.

key.name: WaferNb
key.description: Populates wt_splitlot.wafer_nb as an integer. Used for v6.4 and later.

key.name: WaferNotch
key.description: Populates et_wafer_info.wafer_flat as an character. Used for v6.4 and later.

key.name: WeekNb
key.description: Used for WYR data insertion.

key.name: Year
key.description: Used for WYR data insertion.

key.name: AllowBinPRRMismatch
key.description: Option: Allow Bin category and PRR Pass/Fail flags Mismatch

key.name: ForceTestingStage
key.description: Option: Forces data in a particular testing stage. Values are W for wafer test, F for final test, and E for Etest (fab or PCM test).

key.name: IgnoreResults
key.description: Option: Raw test results will not be inserted but read from the file to keep the test definition and the statistics.

key.name: IgnoreResultsIfNbPartsMoreThan
key.description: Option: For any file with more parts than the integer specified, Raw test results will not be inserted but read from the file to keep the test definition and the statistics.

key.name: IgnoreSummary
key.description: Option: Allows the customer to ignore summary records in the STDF file. (PCR, TSR, HBR, SBR)

key.name: RejectIfNbPartsLessThan
key.description: Option: If the number of parts in the file is less than the integer specified in this field, the file will be rejected.

key.name: RejectIfNbPartsPercentOfGDPWLessThan
key.description: Option: The gross die per wafer is used to calculate the percent yield for the file. If this yield is below the specified integer in this field, the file will be rejected.

key.name: RejectIfPassHardBinNotInList
key.description: Option: For any file, if the bin or bin list is not in the list of pass hard bins, the file will be rejected. Value is a list (i.e. 2,3 or 2-5,6,9).

key.name: ReplaceExistingData
key.description: Option: Allow the customer to override existing data

key.name: TestMergeBy
key.description: Option: Allow the customer to merge test with identical number or name.

key.name: TestRemoveSequencerName
key.description: Option: Allow the customer to remove the sequencer name when it appears into the test name and matchs the GEX syntax.

key.name: TestRemovePinName
key.description: Option: Allow the customer to remove the pin name when it appears into the test name and matchs the GEX syntax.

key.name: TestIgnoreDtrTestConditions
key.description: Option: Specify if DTR have to be ignored or not when they store test conditions.

key.name: Wt_YieldConsolidation_Rule
key.description: Option: This option was replaced by the Consolidation Tree tool.
